page.title: 08Unemployed - Use of Time.
page.content: Interview.Alan Rhodes. How do you spend your time now at home? "Well,I potter around the house,do the gardening or watch TV. If the weather's nice then I take the dog for a long walk to get away from the house. If it's raining you are just sat in the house bored doing nothing I only go to the pub once a week,and then only spend a bit of money".We asked him how much he gets he answered "Â£54.00,".I think that Alan must be very unhappy and bored because he has to stay in the house all the time when it's wet. "I'd sooner have a job," he said. He thinks there will be no change. It will take a long time and they havent got enough time left.
